full_text: MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET ZB DATE: 8-3-19 TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE 12:00-12:30 AM 1219 1223 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 8:00-8:30 AM 807 809 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 4:00-4:30 PM 467 410 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 12:30- 1:00 AM 1248 1251 8:30- 9:00 AM 833 836 4:30-5:00 PM 425 438 1:00-1:30 AM 107 110 9:00-9:30 AM 916 918 5:00 -5:30 PM 508 508 1:30-2:00 AM 136 139 9:30-10:00 AM 941 943 5:30-6:00 PM 531 534 2:00-2:30 AM 211 214 10:00-10:30 AM 1003 1005 6:00-6:30 PM 600 603 2:30-3:00 AM 237 240 10:30-11:00 AM 1047 1049 6:30-7:00 PM 637 640 3:00-3:30 AM 301 304 11:00-11:30 AM 1116 1118 7:00-7:30 PM 703 711 3:30-4:00 AM 333 336 11:30-12:00 AM 1146 1149 7:30-8:00 PM 739 742 4:00-4:30 AM 425 428 12:00-12:30 PM 1204 1207 8:00-8:30 PM 811 814 4:30-5:00 AM 442 445 12:30- 1:00 PM 1236 1233 8:30- 9:00 PM 842 845 5:00 -5:30 AM 500 503 1:00-1:30 PM 167 110 9:00-9:30 PM 713 916 5:30-6:00 AM 553 556 2:00-2:30 PM 133 134 9:30-10:00 PM 945 947 6:00-6:30 AM 614 617 2:30-3:00 PM 211 214 10:00-10:30 PM 613 613 6:30-7:00 AM 635 638 3:00-3:30 PM 244 244 10:30-11:00 PM 875 898 7:00-7:30 AM 719 722 3:30-4:00 PM 309 311 11:00-11:30 PM 917 920 7:30-8:00 AM 748 751 4:00-4:00 PM 933 933 11:30-12:00 PM 949 953 MORNING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Y WATCH ERATIONS UTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) ENING WATCH OPERATIONS EUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. A (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN DOJ-OGR-00026459

text_blocks.content: MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET ZB

A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. A
REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN

additional_notes: The document contains handwritten check-in times and signatures. Some information is redacted with (b)(6); (b)(7)(C).
